name: 3D Platformer Tutorial (karkylu)
description:
This is my 3D Platformer Project Tutorial.

Modifications that I plan to add include:

1) Reskin the game graphics, and change the look and feel of the game

2) Add new player abilities and enemy abilities

3) Create an additional complete, interesting level

Other less significant modifications that I plan to implement include music and sound effect changes, changes in color scheme, and added details.

Created by Lula Karakitsos
